definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: May I see your passport and customs declaration form?
sentences.chinese: 可以看你的護照和報關單嗎？

sentences.english: The company's headquarter is located in Jinhua city and the company has its own customs broker.
sentences.chinese: 公司總部設在金華，並有自己的報關行。

sentences.english: Article 2 The system of uniform national examination shall be applied to the qualification examination on customs declarers .
sentences.chinese: 第二條報關員資格考試實行全國統一考試製度。

sentences.english: Entry into the United States would require consular invoice in quadruplicate.
sentences.chinese: 在美國辦理報關手續需要四份領事發票。

sentences.english: Then the customs declaration may be made by consignees or their agents.
sentences.chinese: 收貨人或其代理人可辦理貨物報關手續。

sentences.english: Contact shipping companies, and complete declaration of export commodities and inspection work.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫船運公司，並完成出口商品的報關和報檢工作。

sentences.english: To clear the customs declaration engaged in legal form of qualification system.
sentences.chinese: 以法律形式明確了從事報關員工作的資格制度。

sentences.english: Please clear the goods and forward them by rail to our address, carriage pay.
sentences.chinese: 請將該貨物報關後，通過鐵路交本公司，運費已付。

sentences.english: The declarant certified personnel integrates the world along with the Chinese economy, but is scarcer.
sentences.chinese: 報關員持證人員隨着中國經濟融入世界而更加緊俏。

sentences.english: Receivers of such certificates may apply to the customs for registration according to relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 取得報關員資格證書者可以按規定向海關申請註冊。

sentences.english: Customs declarers shall continuously improve their own professional qualities and skills.
sentences.chinese: 報關員應當不斷提高自身業務素質和職業技能。

sentences.english: Please fill out these customs forms for each package.
sentences.chinese: 請爲每個包裹填寫一張報關單。

sentences.english: Item No. is refers to the order of this type of commodity in this customs declaration form.
sentences.chinese: 項號指該類貨物在本報關單中的序號。

sentences.english: TNT limited cargo insured value no more than USD600 when cargo do not need single customs clearance.
sentences.chinese: 沒有核銷單TNT也無法對貨物進行單獨報關。

sentences.english: Article 2 The examination of the qualification of declarers will be held unitarily nationwide.
sentences.chinese: 第二條報關員資格考試實行全國統一考試製度。

sentences.english: The institution of import and export commodities inspection should inspect the commodities declared for export strictly according to the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 商檢機構對報關出口的貨物應嚴格按規定進行商檢。

definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
to clear customs/(gaming) to finish (a game, a level, a stage, etc)
to pass through a country's territory/transit
